text: Fahd bin Muqrin (Arabic:فهد بن مقرن) is a Saudi civic leader, businessman, and member of the House of Saud. ==Biography== He is the president of the Saudi national initiative "Sons of the Homeland," an initiative "led by 50 intellectuals, scientists and business leaders in the Kingdom" whose purpose is "to prepare youth to serve the nation and contribute toward the homeland's security. He is also the president of the Saudi National Environmental Education Initiative. Fahd is the son of former Crown Prince Muqrin bin Abdul- AzizSaudi Arabia's King Abdullah bin Abdulaziz dies BBC. 23 January 2015. Retrieved 20 March 2015. and Noura bint Ahmed Almuqrin, and a brother of Prince Turki bin Muqrin bin Abdulaziz and Prince Mansour bin Muqrin.Family Directory Data Arabia. His son, Faisal bin Fahd, has been deputy governor of Hail since 2018. ==References== Fahd Category:Living people Fahd Fahd Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Fahd bin Muqrin
